com.google.android.exoplayer.drm

Class FrameworkMediaDrm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.FrameworkMediaDrm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExoMediaDrm<FrameworkMediaCrypto>

    public final class FrameworkMediaDrm
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExoMediaDrm<FrameworkMediaCrypto>
    An ExoMediaDrm implementation that wraps the framework MediaDrm.
